## Shiny application

- ウェブで統計分析を実行した後、その結果を論文用テーブルと図でダウンロード
- 無料統計ウェブ openstat.ai



::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
[**openstat.ai**](https://openstat.ai/)**: free**

![](example-meta.png)
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**ユーザーに合わせた分析ウェブは有料**

![](https://oopy.lazyrockets.com/api/v2/notion/image?src=https%3A%2F%2Fs3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com%2Fsecure.notion-static.com%2F5a9631fa-d51e-4701-a2e8-c1087a0f2c3b%2FUntitled.png&blockId=05eff788-7894-4c2e-9cfe-b8056bc0bcd7)
:::
:::

::: notes
So, We developed real-time web application that researchers can use easily. First, We have released openstat dot A.I., a free web site, containing analyzes commonly used in medical research. Researchers do not need to install it on their PCs, but can access it from any device including PC, mobile and tablet. Researchers can directly upload their data, and analyze it with a click rather than coding, and download the report right away. Customized web application for specific researches are provided with paid service.
:::

## R package for medical research

CRAN(計15万回ダウンロード)

- [jskm](https://github.com/jinseob2kim/jskm): 生存分析 kaplan-meier plot
- [jstable](https://github.com/jinseob2kim/jskm): 回帰分析 テーブル作り
- [jsmodule](https://github.com/jinseob2kim/jskm): Shiny module & ローカルコンピュータでopenstat.aiを実行


<center><a href="https://github.com/jinseob2kim/"><img src="Unknown-2.png" width="50%"/></a></center>

::: notes
We have modulized more than 90% of analytical methods of medical researches. And all analytical modules are released as open source softwares. Anyone can reuse our codes. Figures below are open source softwares we developed with R, a programing language in field of data science
:::

## Open-source R&D

**Cloud based open-source statistical software development**

-   Ministry of Science and ICT(\$800,000)
-   **Fast, Easy-to-use, and for all people**

<center><a href="https://github.com/statgarten/"><img src="statgarten.png" width="50%"/></a></center>

::: notes
We were selected for open source SW start-up and open source software R&D hosted by Ministry of Science and ICT, based on our contribution to open source and community. The topic of R and D is to develop Cloud based open-source statistical software for general public, not doctors. As you see the figure below, we are developing it under the project name of "statgarten".
:::

:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Future: new drug**

-   Clinical trial data analysis
-   With global pharma, CRO, big tech

::: notes
I will tell you about our future plan. Our current goal is to become the No. 1 data analysis company in the field of medical research. I think we are already No. 1.

Based on a strong network with Korean researchers, we are actively supporting global collaborative research. In addition, We will continuously contribute to the open source ecosystem and related communities.

We currently support analytics for medical research., but we plan to support analysis for clinical trials in the future. We have signed our first contract with domestic pharma company recently. Especially, We will provide service specialized especially for Digital Therapeutics(DTx) and decentralized clinical trial(DCT).
:::
